data.text: @nzherald If you try and order one through this site, you need to be symptomatic, or have a household member test positive. No allowance for close contact exposure testing. Pathetic system. So to be safe you need to buy them at inflated prices. #enoughisenough
@nzherald Apparently you have to go and collect them. Great for all those blind and other people who don’t drive and are isolating
@nzherald Testing yourself for eternity. For a runny nose. Seek help.
@TheCoderReturns @nzherald theres heaps at my local. Just ring the 0800 number if you need them

@nzherald Why we still have to struggle to buy a RAT in any pharmacy or supermarket?
Why this government is always *late* for everything if we were one of the last countries to have it??
@nzherald Does not seem to be working

@nzherald The pandemic won’t end unless we stop close contact that spreads the virus! use app Bost instead to safely communicate with people around. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/S0CjFY495Y
